scripts.fullStart: npm run deploy && npm run start
scripts.fullDevStart: concurrently "npm run updateDbDev" "npm run deployDev" "npm run dev"

scriptsComments.displayDb: This will open the prisma studio and show a visual representation of the data
scriptsComments.updateDb: If you update the prisma scheme, you need to run this command to update the database
scriptsComments.fullStart: Deploys the slash commands and starts the bot
scriptsComments.updateDbDev: This will update the database when you change the prisma scheme with nodemon (DEV)
scriptsComments.deployDev: Deploys the slash commands with nodemon (DEV)
scriptsComments.fullDevStart: Deploys the slash commands and starts the bot with nodemon and updates database (DEV)
